dct_title_s: A new & accurate map of Negroland and the adjacent countries also Upper Guinea
dct_alternative_sm: New and accurate map of Negroland and the adjacent countries also Upper Guinea
dct_description_sm: Map of part of the west coast of Africa, with relief shown pictorially.
Plate 48 from: A complete atlas, or, Distinct view of the known world / by Emanuel Bowen. London : Printed for William Innys and Joseph Richardson ... [et al.], 1752.
dct_publisher_sm: Printed for William Innys and Joseph Richardson ... [et al.]
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Caroline Batchelor Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
